column4: I have heard of a power draining bug in oneric, does anyone have any ideas of how to fix it? I am currently downloading the ISO, 1 hour to go
I have a 6cell netbook, on 11.04 I get 5~6 hours
I got this idea about battery life from http://www.omgubuntu.co.uk/2011/10/ubuntu-11-10-released/, where it has Battery Drain near the end
If you're referring to the Sandy Bridge power regression, its listed in the release notes, more info at https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/818830
